PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-03652008-02-18,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of BRIAN MITCHELL, of Westmount, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, in the place of Johanne Brunet, effective April 21, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
